review.reviewBody: The sauce that came with the pizza was amazing, adds yummyness to the pizza!
this doesn't taste like bbq. It's tasteless. no sauce on it, just plain pizza.
Their pizzas are amazing, and topped generously, whether thin or regular base. High quality ingredients, and well cooked. De-licious.
Got the Meat Lovers (Medium 12") . Great Value. Good taste. It was a solid choice.
Pizza Art never disappoints. Best pizza joint in the area
